definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Blend egg with 2 tbsp of mungbean flour. Add in chicken and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋加生粉2汤匙拌匀成浓糊状，加入鸡块拦匀。

sentences.english: The fermentation of lactic acid by rye bran flour was studied here.
sentences.chinese: 最后，论文对黑麦麸皮生粉乳酸发酵进行了研究。

sentences.english: Mix chicken meat with some light soy sauce & cornflour .
sentences.chinese: 鸡肉用少许生抽及生粉拌匀。

sentences.english: Stir in cornflour mixture and cook until sauce thickens . Return chicken pieces to sauce. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 最后拌入生粉水埋芡，鸡件放回锅内即可品尝。

sentences.english: Add corn flour and salt to beaten egg and stir well. Refrigerate the egg mixture for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蛋汁加入生粉及盐，搅匀后放入雪柜冷藏约10分钟。

sentences.english: Adding corn flour sauce with water may help decrease the amount of oil used when cooking.
sentences.chinese: 用少量生粉和水作芡汁可减少烹调时的用油份量。

sentences.english: Add the cherry and some cornstarch water, toss well. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 加入樱桃及适量生粉水炒匀，即成。

sentences.english: Stir in beaten egg and coat fillet lightly with cornflour .
sentences.chinese: 拌入蛋汁，薄薄沾上生粉。

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
